code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt with C/O moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a 75 yo female retired. denies any alcohol use she has a history of smoking o:Height 59 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use she has a

td.content: s:patient presents with 6 days history of worsening moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a female aged 75 years. o:Height 59 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famcyclovir - 500 mg 3 x per day, and ordered Myringotomy - ear.

s:a F aged 76 years presents with 10 months history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. patient reports moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. o:Height 60 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed famcyclovir - 500 mg 3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
